text: Ingaba lowo wabeka isiseko sesakhiwo sakhe phezu kobunyulu kuAllâh nokukholisa Yena, nguyena ungcono na okanye ngulowo wabeka isiseko sesakhiwo sakhe ecicini lomngxuma osele ulungele ukuphasalaka (eso sakhiwo sakhe sithi saa) phantsi, kangangokuba sidilike siphasalake sibe ngamasuntswana ndawonye naye eMlilweni wesiHogo? UAllâh Akabakhokeli abantu abazizingcoli
